author.author_credit: Tula's Pocketbook: A Spell Compendium for the More Melee Inclined Caster

npc.name: Ulysses Poleski
npc.title: Vice Admiral
npc.description: A brilliant sailor and leader who climbed the ranks at an early age.  She is known for making daring decisions when the situation calls for it, and for succeeding in those trying times.

npc.name: Jurel Ahlmeric
npc.title: Captain of the Holly Dodger
npc.description: A cold and intimidating sahuagin who keeps a blade in hand at all times.  He is known to be particularly brutal to those on his ship who betray his trust.

npc.name: Dukhoevy Baromir
npc.title: Archmage of Thessk
npc.description: A competent and careful man who knows exactly how much force is needed to get the desired results.  His temper is well managed, but truly wrathful when invoked.

npc.name: Arrakh Visum
npc.title: Scribe
npc.description: An arrogant but knowledgeable academic who takes a great deal of pride in conducting dangerous field work, though he quietly resents those who have stationary assignments out of jealousy.

npc.name: Lomar Wendriksen
npc.title: Scribe
npc.description: A terse and bitter little gnome, Lomar has tended to the records of Thessk for several human generations.  His less than pleasant attitude is only tolerated due to his vast irreplaceable knowledge of the maze that is the Lower Library of Thessk.
